Class('Siesta.Content.Manager.NodeJS', {

    isa     : Siesta.Content.Manager,

    methods : {

        load : function (url, callback, errback) {

            try {
                var content = require('fs').readFileSync(url, 'utf8')

            } catch (e) {
                errback(e)

                return
            }

            callback(content)
        }
    }
})
